SELECT r.reservation_no, r.user_no, r.service_no, r.partner_no, r.reservation_status, r.order_no, r.total_quantity, r.total_price, r.reg_date, r.upd_date, r.cancel_no, u.user_name, u.user_address, pu.user_name AS partner_name, s.service_name FROM reservation r JOIN users u ON r.user_no = u.user_no JOIN partner p ON r.partner_no = p.partner_no JOIN users pu ON p.user_no = pu.user_no JOIN service s ON r.service_no = s.service_no WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
